description: Configuration for different edit look variations

better_looking.name: Better-Looking
better_looking.prompt: better-looking, enhanced features, more attractive, refined appearance, photorealistic, realistic lighting, high detail, lifelike

japanese_looking.name: Japanese-Looking
japanese_looking.prompt: Japanese appearance, East Asian features, Japanese ethnicity, photorealistic, realistic lighting, high detail, lifelike

more_male.name: More Male
more_male.prompt: more masculine, stronger male features, masculine appearance, photorealistic, realistic lighting, high detail, lifelike

more_female.name: More Female
more_female.prompt: more feminine, softer female features, feminine appearance, photorealistic, realistic lighting, high detail, lifelike

white_skinned.name: White-Skinned
white_skinned.prompt: white skin tone, fair skin, light complexion, photorealistic, realistic lighting, high detail, lifelike

dark_skinned.name: Dark-Skinned
dark_skinned.prompt: dark skin tone, deep complexion, darker skin, photorealistic, realistic lighting, high detail, lifelike

game_render.name: Game Render
game_render.prompt: game engine render, Unreal Engine style, realistic game graphics, 3D game character

2d_cartoon.name: 2D Cartoon
2d_cartoon.prompt: 2D cartoon style, animated illustration, cartoon art, flat shading

3d_cartoon.name: 3D Cartoon
3d_cartoon.prompt: 3D cartoon style, Pixar style, stylized 3D, cartoon render
